snippet: The fish, distinguishable by their significant size and jumping ability, are a favorite of anglers, in part for the challenge they present.
abstract: Box Seats article by Chris Santella describes fishing for Tarpon off the southern coast of Cuba; says Tarpon, distinguishable by their significant size and jumping ability, are a favorite among anglers for the challenge they present.
lead_paragraph: The fish, distinguishable by their significant size and jumping ability, are a favorite of anglers, in part for the challenge they present.

headline.seo: Tarpon Are a Favorite of Anglers, in Part for the Fight They Put Up
headline.main: To Catch a Tarpon, Be Ready for a Fight
